articles.content:
DPRK Women's Football Team to Advance into Finals at 15th Asiad
   Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The DPRK women's football team beat the Chinese team 3:1 in the semi-finals at the 15th Asian Games held in Qatar on Dec. 10.
 The DPRK team will face the Japanese team in the finals on Dec. 13.
